data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Biswas, Roy (2008): Description Of Six New Species Of Spiders Of The Genera Lathys (Family: Dictynidae), Marpissa (Family: Salticidae), Misumenoides (Family: Thomisidae), Agroeca (Family: Clubionidae), Gnaphosa (Family: Gnaphosidae) And Flanona (Family: Lycosidae) - From India. Rec. Zool. Surv. India 108 (1): 43-57, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.556084, URL: http://faunaofindia.nic.in/PDFVolumes/records/108/01/0043-0057.pdf|8 occurrences
